item.title: Mod Icons/Colour text ~317~
item.dc:creator: @05bgoodson 05bgoodson
item.description:
@05bgoodson wrote:

hi guys i need some help… i want to change my mod icons etc however in my sprites folder there is only ones that are for the inventory, chat, compass. i can’t find any of the actural crowns anywhere. in-game it is shown as the the default ones.

i’ve found some code about mod icons but i’m not sure what it means

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2_869.method359(true); for (int l4 = 0; l4 < 2; l4++) { aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2Array1219[l4] = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2( class44_2, "mod_icons", l4); }

dunno if it means anything to you guys

i’ve also looked into the cache folder and theres even less in there.
i only found this bit of code using z-file searcher.

Also i want to add colour to the yell chat. eg i have made it so depending on your rights the yell will be different titles, eg owner will have [OWNER] then player name and text, how can i place colour here so it will be [ADMIN]. When i use any @***@ colour things i doesn’t add a colour in-game but stays as normal text

Thanks goes to whoever can help me.

Read full topic
